talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$MF-1$
Woof… I could have taken care of them myself…

${user_nick}$
It’s all thanks to you.
I could feel a strange power when I covered you.
Are you like a special robot or something…?

$MF-1$
Now you realise my true worth!

(He tries to imitate a roar with his mouth wide open.)

${user_nick}$
(Judging from his reaction, I must have been mistaken.)

Anyway, why were they chasing you?
Where’s your master?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(This hound is always moving so frantically!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$MF-1$
Woof! I almost forgot!
Oh no! I lost my master!!

(The hound keeps circling in one spot.)

$MF-1$
Master… I mistook you for my master… Snff.
But my master can’t fight like you. She’s not well...
By the way, who are you?! (He sniffs your feet.)

$MF-1$
Hey... That’s the same name as my master!
And you look just like her. *Sniff* But you smell a little different…

$MF-1$
Although you have the same name and face as my master…
You’re not my master! What is not is not, period!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Pet him on the head)</FONT> I hope you’ll find your master soon.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$MF-1$
I’m off to find my real master now.
Hey… Can you stroke my head before we say goodbye?

(He is leaning his shiny head towards you again.)
